p: Methods: Prospective cohort study of survivors, admitted to a mixed ICU between January and September 2010. Clinical evaluation was performed at 6 months and 5 years after hospital discharge and it included the Dementia Rating Scale-2 (DRS-2), Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS), Post-traumatic stress syndrome 14-questions inventory (PTSS-14), Medical Outcomes Study 36-Item Short Form (SF-36) and the Euro Quality of Life 5 Dimensions (EQ-5-D) in both two moments.
